name: Celestial Ambrosia
description: It was said that even Titans covet this ambrosial libation. Cast it into the Tides of the Basin within the Vortex of Genesis.
story: The absolute finest of Amphoreus' thousand ambrosias. A golden, sweet nectar. It is said to come from the divine corpus of the Chalice of Plenty spilled onto the earth, making it the perfect offering to the Titans. Just a few drops are enough to inebriate a mortal with its rich fragrance. Consuming it on its own leads to unconsciousness, as if one is drowning in a vast ocean.
